QuickstartÂ¶

Once you've completed Installing PyWFOM and Arduino Setup, the system can start to be configured.

The quickest way to do this is the wfom-configure (from the Command Line Tools). Which can be run in Verbose Mode by opening a Command Line and entering:

wfom-configure -v
